Nightlight::

"Arrow..." said with a low voice Nightlight and she shouted "All it's 
ok, Arrow, don't worry... Zeni it's ok. He isn't hurt...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Burning Hammer looked at Nighlight now. WIth sad eyes and a 
confused look.
> Zeni came out from behind Burning Hammer and stepped in front of 
him. Arrow
> could be heard from outside.
> 
> Arrow: Open the shields! Come on, open them! Open them!!!
> 
> Burning Hammer eyes darted to the door.
> 
> Burning hammer: Shouldn't you open the shields?
> 
> His eyes quickly returned to Zeni. Zeni held out his hand to the 
serial
> killer turned bounty hunter. Burning Hammer took his hand.
> 
> Burning Hammer: I killed my best friend, kid, I'm not so great, not 
great
> like I thought I was. I killed him because there was a bounty on 
him. if
> that tells how great I am.
> 
> Zeni: You can still be great.
> 
> Arrow: Open the damn door!
> 
> Arrow never let up, never stopped yelling until he got what he 
wanted...
> 
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <airly2000@y...>
> To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 12:23 AM
> Subject: Re: Dark returns...

when

and
